item.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T06C37
item.description:
Dec 22, 06:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 22/12/2024 03:47 UTC
End Time : 22/12/2024 06:10 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack T06C37 were temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Cooling module issue.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 22, 04:10 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 22, 04:09 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 22/12/2024 03:47 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack T06C37 are temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Cooling module issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to fix the issue and will reboot some servers.

Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [CA/APAC][Bare Metal] - server lifecycle processes incident notification
item.description:
Dec 19, 04:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/12/2024 02:24 UTC
End Time : 19/12/2024 04:16 UTC
Service impact : The server lifecycle processes, including reopening, suspension, and deletion of dedicated servers, were slowed down.
We are pleased to inform you that the issue has been resolved, and all services have returned to normal.
Root cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
